Comment_77:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Did you get rid of some stuff, mister?
Yaaay! Now I can give you your reward
for playing with me!
Comment_79:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Huh? Your pouch is still full, mister.
Didn't ya hear what I said before?
Comment_40:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Whaaa? But, but, you played treasure
hunt with my big brother Zuta...<sp:0:4:0>Why won't you play a game with me?
Comment_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I don't have to eat dinner yet! Do you
want to do a quiz?
Comment_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I ate, and my tummy's sooo full...<sp:5:0:0>
You wanna do a quiz? It'll help our
food go down!
Comment_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Um, so, at our village...<sp:0:4:0>There was a big pirate ship that showed
up like BOOM! And these scary guys
came out of it? These <clr:0000>pirate <clr:ffff>guys?
So my dad put me on his back and we got
out of there!<sp:0:4:0>Then he walked for a long time...and I
think he turned left? And then we kept
going in one direction foreeever.<sp:0:4:0>So from here, all you have to do is walk
forward a long, long way, and turn right!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800>Pretty amazing how I remembered the
directions, huh?
Comment_42:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Quiz tiiime!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>Voltfin trout and electric darner can both
go in elixirs to stop electri... <sp:5:0:0>electrici...<sp:5:0:0>
getting zapped from hurting as much.
But which one can you ONLY see
when it's raining? Voltfin trout or
electric darner?
Comment_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I love <clr:0000>froggies<clr:ffff>!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00>But it's weird... Why are they all hiding?
Normally, tireless froggies love rain!

Do you think tireless froggies are scared
of pirates, too, and went to hide in <clr:0000>caves<clr:ffff>?
Comment_43: <sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL>Too bad! The answer was electric darner!
Comment_60:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive>A lot of the time, where there are birdies,
you can also find lots of fishies!<sp:0:4:0>I'm pretty smart, huh?
Comment_27:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Hey, hey, play with me!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>Let's, uh...<sp:5:1:0> Umm...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0100>I know! I'll give you a quiz! You ready
for a quiz?
Comment_61: <sp:3:0:2:0800>That was fun! Let's play again soon, OK?
Comment_29:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL>Yaaay! My mom's really good at cooking,
so I know lots about ingredients and stuff.
Comment_46:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive>I caught an electric darner the other day
when it was rainy and lightning<sp:5:0:0>-y!<sp:0:4:0>I left all my metal stuff at home
so I wouldn't have to worry about
getting zapped!
Comment_63:

Comment_66:

Comment_67:

"razorclaw crab," and "ironshell crab."

You can catch razorclaw crabs and
ironshell crabs near here!
Comment_68: <sp:3:0:2:0800>That was fun! Let's play again soon, OK?
Comment_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I wanted to play with the <clr:0000>froggies<clr:ffff>, but I

the pirates and went to hide in <clr:0000>caves<clr:ffff>.
Comment_30:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL>Hooraaay! I know lots about ingredients,
so I'll quiz you about those!
Comment_31:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Quiz time!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>Hightail lizard and hot-footed frog can

Hightail lizard or hot-footed frog?
Comment_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>The way we got here was we escaped
the village, turned left, and then walked
foreeeeever.<sp:0:4:0>So, if you walk forwards from here and
go right, that's how you get to our village.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800>Pretty amazing how I remembered the
directions, huh?
Comment_32:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL>Bzzz! The answer was hot-footed frog!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>I guess that's why they're so hard
to catch, huh?
Comment_50: <sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL>BZZZT! <sp:5:0:0>Hehe. It lets you do an ice attack!
Comment_34:

<sp:3:0:2:0c00>They probably got scared of the pirates
and are hiding in <clr:0000>caves<clr:ffff>, even though the
pirates are gone now!
